text: Rotenburg is a district (Landkreis) in Lower Saxony, Germany. The Wümme River runs through the district from east to west. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden #Bremervörde #Rotenburg #Visselhövede Free municipalities #Gnarrenburg #Scheeßel *1.
